duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform field service and in shop repairs on food preparation equipment.
Troubleshoot and diagnose equipment problems, including electrical/mechanical and electronics troubleshooting.
Maintain frequent contact with the office for service assignments and review service problems with advisor, supervisor, or manager.
Assist with equipment installations and perform major repair assignments.
Maintain working knowledge of parts stocking and identification methods.
Complete maintenance, sanitation, and audio/visual field training as required.
Assist in developing sales leads for contracts and product demonstrations at customer locations and trade shows.
Comply with all service policies and procedures, safety standards, and perform PLC and HMI programming.
Consult with bakeries to identify process improvements and diagnose mechanical weaknesses to provide value-added solutions.
Travel 50% domestic and international with extended hour work weeks, including overtime and on-call assistance.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED. Preferred: electrical certification or relevant vocational training.
